advancedperipherals.name: Advanced Peripherals
advancements.advancedperipherals.base_to: Collect redstone integrator, inventory manager and energy detector. How did you even play without this?
advancements.advancedperipherals.end_aut: Se conseguir programar uma posição de localização GPS-free, você ganha
advancements.advancedperipherals.nbt_too: Collect NBT storage and block reader. Now all of the world's secrets are open to you!
advancements.advancedperipherals.overpow: Can you handle so much power?
advancements.advancedperipherals.root.de: Cada viagem começa com o primeiro bloco...
advancements.advancedperipherals.sense_t: A verdade não pode se esconder para sempre
Apanhe um digitalizador geográfico e detetor ambiental. Não há limites para a observabilidade!
advancements.advancedperipherals.weak_au: A vida após a morte existe em Minecraft?
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.block_r: §7This block is able to read data of blocks and tile entities in front of it
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.chat_bo: §7Can be used to read and write messages to the ingame chat.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.chunk_c: §7A crafting ingredient for the Chunky Turtle.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.colony_: §7This block is able to interact with mine colonies
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.compute: §7Você pode acessar uma ‘interface’ gráfica dos nossos blocos com esta ferramenta mágica. Mas, por enquanto, é inútil.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.disable: §cEste item está desativado nas configurações, pode criá-lo, mas a lógica periférica não funcionará
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.end_aut: §7Upgrade for turtle, that allows basic interaction and teleportation in world
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.energy_: §7Pode detetar o fluxo de energia e atuar como resistência.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.environ: §7Can be used to interact with the World.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.geo_sca: §7This block is able to scan the area around it
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.husband: §7Upgrade for turtle, that allows basic interaction and advanced interaction with animals
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.invento: §7This block is able to send or receive specific items from a player inventory.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.me_brid: §7Can be used to interact with Applied Energistics 2.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.memory_: §7Can save the rights of a player to use it in a inventory manager.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.nbt_sto: §7This block is able to store some nbt data
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.overpow: §7Improved version of end automata core, that provide some overpowered uses! Be careful, upgrade is very fragile.
§7Improved version of husbandry automata core, that provide some overpowered uses! Be careful, upgrade is very fragile.
§7Improved version of weak automata core, that provide some overpowered uses! Be careful, upgrade is very fragile.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.periphe: §7An empty hull without the love it deserves.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.player_: §7Can be used to interact with Players.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.redston: §7This block is able to interact with redstone. Works exactly like the redstone api of an computer.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.rs_brid: §7Can be used to interact with Refined Storage.
item.advancedperipherals.tooltip.weak_au: §7Upgrade for turtle, that makes the turtle useful again
text.advancedperipherals.added_player: Added you to the memory card
text.advancedperipherals.automata_core_f: You trying to feed entity to soul, but your own body refuses to do this. Maybe something more mechanical can do this?
